casebody.data:
CRAWFORD
v.
MINTZ, et al. No. 47A08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 14, 2008. Michael J. Tadych, Raleigh, for Crawford. John M. Kirby, Raleigh, for Mintz, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of October 2008 by Plaintiffs for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 14th day of October 2008."
